title: Racist Rhetoric Repeating, Law & Order: Havana Syndrome Unit 05.17.22
itunes:title: Racist Rhetoric Repeating, Law & Order: Havana Syndrome Unit 05.17.22
description:
In episode 1249, Jack and Miles are joined by rapper and host of Hood Politics, Propaganda to discuss... Racist Republican Rhetoric…, Replacement Theory Motivation Behind Buffalo, Pittsburgh, El Paso, Law & Order Tackles Havana Syndrome, For Some Reason and more!

  1. Replacement Theory Motivation Behind Buffalo, Pittsburgh, El Paso
  2. We Can’t Talk About the Racist Massacre in Buffalo Without Talking About Capitalism
  3. Liberals Blocked on Gun Control, Call for a New Domestic Terror Law After the Shooting
  4. Law & Order Tackles Havana Syndrome

VISIT: prophiphop.com/

LISTEN: Two Chords & The Truth by Myele Manzanza
